title: The Chemical Pact
description: After sealing the chemical vats in the Laundry Ward, you discover the chemicals were being supplied by the religious Concordat. You must confront the Archbishop about arming assassins.

turns.narrative: You breach the secret Embassy hidden under the Laundry Ward. Fanatical Paladins block the Archbishop's door.
turns.choice_a: Present the 'Master's Ledger Key' as proof of their crimes
turns.consequence_a: The Paladins are shocked. Several lower their weapons, refusing to defend a traitor to the faith.
turns.consequence_b: A grueling fight against heavy armor and healing magic. You win, but are exhausted.

turns.narrative: The Archbishop reveals he armed the assassins to cull the 'unworthy' poor of Emberheart before the 'Great Cleanse'.
turns.choice_a: Arrest him and drag him before the High Steward
turns.consequence_a: He goes quietly, knowing his zealots will riot to free him later.
turns.choice_b: Execute him on the spot for treason
turns.consequence_b: You cut him down. The remaining Paladins swear a blood-oath against you.

archbishop_arrested.description: You arrested the Archbishop, sparking a political crisis.

archbishop_executed.description: You executed the Archbishop, making an enemy of the Concordat.

conclusion: You arrested the Archbishop, sparking a political crisis.

risk_matrix.critical_failure: The attempt failed with minor lasting consequences. The thread remains open.
